de.topicmapslab.tmql4j.merge.components.interpreter
Class MergeExpressionInterpreter

java.lang.Object
  de.topicmapslab.tmql4j.components.interpreter.ExpressionInterpreterImpl<MergeExpression>
      de.topicmapslab.tmql4j.merge.components.interpreter.MergeExpressionInterpreter
All Implemented Interfaces:
IExpressionInterpreter<MergeExpression>
public class MergeExpressionInterpreter
extends ExpressionInterpreterImpl<MergeExpression>

Special interpreter class to interpret merge-expressions.

The grammar production rule of the expression is:

merge-expression ::= MERGE path-expression

merge-expression ::= MERGE <value-expression> WHERE boolean-expression

merge-expression ::= MERGE ALL WHERE boolean-expression

Author:
Sven Krosse

                                            IContext context,
                                            java.lang.Object... optionalArguments)

Internal method to handle production rule for a merge-expression containing the keyword ALL and a where-clause

Parameters:
runtime - the current TMQL runtime
context - the querying context
optionalArguments - any optional arguments
Returns:
the query matches containing the results of the interpretation of the sub-expression
Throws:
TMQLRuntimeException - thrown in interpretation or the merge operation failed.

merge

private long merge(ITMQLRuntime runtime,
                   QueryMatches[] arguments,
                   java.util.Collection<org.tmapi.core.Construct> alreadyMerged)
            throws TMQLRuntimeException
Utility method to merge the topics or associations contained by the given query matches

Parameters:
runtime - the runtime
arguments - the query matches containing the topics or associations to merge
alreadyMerged - a collection containing all merged constructs
Returns:
the number of merged construct
Throws:
TMQLRuntimeException - thrown if operation fails

interpreteWhereClause

private QueryMatches interpreteWhereClause(ITMQLRuntime runtime,
                                           IContext context,
                                           java.lang.Object... optionalArguments)
                                    throws TMQLRuntimeException
Internal method to interpret contained where-clause of the merge-expression.

Parameters:
runtime - the current TMQL runtime
context - the querying context
optionalArguments - any optional arguments
Returns:
an instance of QueryMatches containing the results of interpretation
Throws:
TMQLRuntimeException - thrown in interpretation failed. Reason could be for example an invalid interpretation of the where-expression.
